title: 包管理工具-pnpm
content:
pnpm

官网

pnpm 安装路径

👑 ~ $ which pnpm
/usr/local/bin/pnpm
👑 ~ $ which pn
pn: aliased to pnpm

使用较短的别名

pnpm 可能很难输入，因此您可以使用较短的别名，例如 pn。 只需将下面这行放入 .bashrc、 .zshrc 或 config.fish 中：

alias pn=pnpm

记得source .zshrc
我的.zshrc路径：/Users/haotian/.zshrc

同理，我们可以将其他命令也简化


alias yn=yarn

♠ /Users/chenhailong $ which pn
pn: aliased to pnpm
♠ /Users/chenhailong $ which yn
yn: aliased to yarn
♠ /Users/chenhailong $

命令行

有关更多信息，请参阅各个 CLI 命令的文档。 以下是简便的 npm 命令等效列表，可帮助您入门：

npm 命令 pnpm 等效
npm install pnpm install
npm i <pkg> [pnpm add <pkg>]
npm run <cmd> [pnpm <cmd>]

升级

升级失败

$ pnpm i -g pnpm # 执行pnpm升级命令报错，是版本bug
Nothing to stop. No server is running for the store at /Users/haotian/Library/pnpm/store/v3
 ERR_PNPM_REGISTRIES_MISMATCH  This modules directory was created using the following registries configuration: {"@ty-fe":"https://registry-npm.ty-inc.top/","default":"https://registry.npmjs.org/"}. The current configuration is {"default":"https://registry.npmjs.org/","@ty-fe":"https://registry-npm.ty-inc.top/","@ty-miniapp":"https://registry-npm.ty-inc.top/"}. To recreate the modules directory using the new settings, run "pnpm install".
$ pnpm install -g # 命令1
Recreating /Users/haotian/Library/pnpm/global/5/node_modules
Lockfile is up to date, resolution step is skipped
Already up to date

/Users/haotian/Library/pnpm/global/5:
+ flow-remove-types 2.202.0
+ jest 29.5.0
+ pnpm 7.30.0

Done in 1s
$ pnpm install -g pnpm # 命令2
Nothing to stop. No server is running for the store at /Users/haotian/Library/pnpm/store/v3
Packages: +1 -1
+-
Progress: resolved 284, reused 283, downloaded 1, added 1, done

/Users/haotian/Library/pnpm/global/5:
- pnpm 7.30.0
+ pnpm 8.6.5

Done in 4.3s
$ pnpm install -g # 再然后就是，你的版本太低了 -_-
ERROR: This version of pnpm requires at least Node.js v16.14
The current version of Node.js is v14.17.4
Visit https://r.pnpm.io/comp to see the list of past pnpm versions with respective Node.js version support.
$ pnpm -v
ERROR: This version of pnpm requires at least Node.js v16.14
The current version of Node.js is v14.17.4
Visit https://r.pnpm.io/comp to see the list of past pnpm versions with respective Node.js version support.
$

node 版本管理

https://github.com/tj/n

看了下，本地版本没有符合要求的

$ n ls
node/14.17.4
node/15.14.0
node/16.13.1
# sudo n  lts


$ n lts # 这个命令mac上没有权限
  installing : node-v18.16.1
       mkdir : /usr/local/n/versions/node/18.16.1
mkdir: /usr/local/n/versions/node/18.16.1: Permission denied

  Error: sudo required (or change ownership, or define N_PREFIX)

$ sudo n  lts # here
Password:
  installing : node-v18.16.1
       mkdir : /usr/local/n/versions/node/18.16.1
       fetch : https://nodejs.org/dist/v18.16.1/node-v18.16.1-darwin-x64.tar.xz
   installed : v18.16.1 (with npm 9.5.1)
